name: Angry Coocking
description:
Hello. We are happy to share with you our game about exciting cooking together with the chef.

Cooking TOGETHER with the chef and make sure he doesn't get his SPATULA!

Putting the ingredients TOGETHER

Have fun!

Keyboard and mouse required

Used programs:

Godot_v3.5.1, Procreate

Authors: byneev, gshooorlt, hestaksa
